function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased number of articles on green building and housing","Impact":"Potential spread of misinformation or incomplete information leading to ineffective construction practices","Mitigation":"Fact-checking and peer review of published articles, dissemination of accurate and verified information","Technologies":"Data analysis and verification tools, peer review platforms","People":"Researchers, architects, construction professionals, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, publishers, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Correlation and distributional hypothesis of topic words","Impact":"Potential for biased or misleading analysis, misinterpretation of data","Mitigation":"Regular validation and cross-validation of topic coherence measures, critical analysis of underlying assumptions","Technologies":"Data visualization and mining tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, data analysts, linguists","Owner":"Research institutions, academic publishers, technology providers"}]}
